name: lambda-html-to-pdf
description: AWS Lambda function that converts HTML pages to PDF documents

scripts.pack: rm -f package.zip && zip package.zip -r index.js wkhtmltopdf utils
scripts.deploy-local: npm run pack && aws lambda update-function-code --region eu-west-1 --function-name htmlToPdf-local --zip-file fileb://`pwd`/package.zip
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run pack && aws lambda update-function-code --region eu-west-1 --function-name htmlToPdf-dev --zip-file fileb://`pwd`/package.zip
scripts.deploy-test: npm run pack && aws lambda update-function-code --region eu-west-1 --function-name htmlToPdf-test --zip-file fileb://`pwd`/package.zip
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run pack && aws lambda update-function-code --region eu-west-1 --function-name htmlToPdf --zip-file fileb://`pwd`/package.zip
